content.query:
COPY INTO wwi_staging.DIM_CVR_CMPT
FROM 'https://asadatalakeimre.dfs.core.windows.net/wwi-02/campaign-analytics/ZTSI_DM.GEN.DIM_CVR_CMPT_42_pre.csv'
WITH (
    FILE_TYPE = 'CSV',
    FIELDTERMINATOR=';',
    ROWTERMINATOR='0X0A',
    ENCODING = 'UTF8'
)
GO

COPY INTO wwi_staging.DIM_CVR_CMPT
-- FROM 'https://asadatalakeimre.dfs.core.windows.net/wwi-02/campaign-analytics/faulty_test.csv'
FROM 'https://asadatalakeimre.dfs.core.windows.net/wwi-02/campaign-analytics/faulty_date.csv'
WITH (
    FILE_TYPE = 'CSV',
    FIELDTERMINATOR=';',
    ROWTERMINATOR='0X0A',
    ENCODING = 'UTF8'
    ,DATEFORMAT = 'DATEFORMAT = 'date_format''
)
GO

SELECT CAST('1753-03-31' AS DATETIME)

SELECT * FROM wwi_staging.DIM_CVR_CMPT


/****** Object:  Table [ZTSI_DM_GEN].[DIM_CVR_CMPT]    Script Date: 15. 01. 2021 14:18:32 ******/
/*SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO


SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO */
DROP TABLE [wwi_staging].[DIM_CVR_CMPT];

CREATE TABLE [wwi_staging].[DIM_CVR_CMPT]
(
    [CVR_CMPT_ID] [bigint] NULL,
    [CVR_CMPT_AID] [bigint] NULL,
    [IDV_AGRM_ID] [bigint] NULL,
    [POLICY_AID] [bigint] NULL,
    [TP_ID] [int] NULL,
    [TP_NM] [nvarchar](100) NULL,
    [TP_DSC] [nvarchar](512) NULL,
    [BM_NM] [nvarchar](100) NULL,
    [BM_DSC] [nvarchar](256) NULL,
    [BM_CORR_FCTR] [decimal](10, 4) NULL,
    [BNS_MALUS_ID] [bigint] NULL,
    [INCEPTION_DT] [datetime] NULL,
    [PLN_END_DT] [datetime] NULL,
    [DDCB_TP] [nvarchar](200) NULL,
    [RPR_BY] [nvarchar](200) NULL,
    [ACTV] [int] NULL,
    [ID_ITEM] [nvarchar](100) NULL,
    [NM] [nvarchar](100) NULL,
    [PRN_PLCY_NM] [nvarchar](100) NULL,
    [ANNEX_NM] [nvarchar](100) NULL,
    [INS_DT_FM] [datetime] NULL,
    [INS_DT_TO] [datetime] NULL,
    [KATP_ID] [int] NULL,
    [KATP_NM] [nvarchar](100) NULL,
    [KATP_GRP_NM] [nvarchar](100) NULL,
    [ESR_AMT] [decimal](20, 4) NULL,
    [ESR_AMT_RC] [decimal](20, 4) NULL,
    [ESR_AMT_DC] [decimal](20, 4) NULL,
    [ESR_CCY_ID] [bigint] NULL,
    [ESR_CCY_NM] [nvarchar](100) NULL,
    [FNC_SVCS_UNIT_AID] [bigint] NULL,
    [FNC_SVCS_UNIT_TP_NM] [nvarchar](100) NULL,
    [FNC_SVCS_UNIT_TP_DSC] [nvarchar](1024) NULL,
    [FNC_SVCS_UNIT_DSC] [nvarchar](512) NULL,
    [FNC_SVCS_UNIT_LEGACY_CODE1] [nvarchar](14) NULL,
    [FNC_SVCS_UNIT_LEGACY_CODE2] [nvarchar](28) NULL,
    [PRL_CGY_NM] [nvarchar](100) NULL,
    [PRL_CGY_SHRT_DSC] [nvarchar](200) NULL,
    [PRL_CGY_DSC] [nvarchar](512) NULL,
    [FNC_SVCS_PD_NM] [nvarchar](400) NULL,
    [FNC_SVCS_PD_DSC] [nvarchar](512) NULL,
    [INS_CLSS_NM] [nvarchar](100) NULL,
    [INS_CLSS_DSC] [nvarchar](512) NULL,
    [DDCB_TP_NM] [nvarchar](100) NULL,
    [DDCB_PCT_MN] [decimal](7, 4) NULL,
    [DDCB_PCT_MX] [decimal](7, 4) NULL,
    [DDCB_AMT_MN] [decimal](15, 2) NULL,
    [DDCB_AMT_MX] [decimal](15, 2) NULL,
    [ANNEX_AID] [bigint] NULL,
    [OBJ_AID] [bigint] NULL,
    [INS_CLSS_AID] [bigint] NULL,
    [FNC_SVCS_PD_AID] [bigint] NULL,
    [PRL_CGY_AID] [bigint] NULL,
    [TMT_DT] [datetime] NULL,
    [ST_ID] [bigint] NULL,
    [ST_DSC] [nvarchar](1024) NULL,
    [EFF_FM_DT] [datetime] NULL,
    [EFF_TO_DT] [datetime] NULL,
    [VLD_FM_DT] [datetime] NULL,
    [VLD_TO_DT] [datetime] NULL,
    [VLD_FLG] [tinyint] NULL,
    [PPN_INFO_ID] [bigint] NULL,
    [PPN_DATE] [datetime] NULL,
    [PPN_INFO_ID_UPD] [bigint] NULL,
    [PPN_DATE_UPD] [datetime] NULL,
    [SRC_APL_ID] [int] NULL,
    [SRC_APL_DSC] [nvarchar](200) NULL,
    [SRC_TBL_ID] [bigint] NULL
)
WITH
(
   DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO
